lines.text: A kingsnake eats nothing but other snakes... preferably rattlesnakes. That is his sole diet. You see, it would go against my nature to cheat an honest man. But the other kind... I sleep like a baby!
Did you ever go fishing, Norbert?
Sure, lots of times. I'm good at fishing.

All right. If you want to catch a fish, you have to think like one. You have to think, where would I be hiding? Gold mining is like that. You have to think like what you want to find... and ask yourself, "If I was gold, where would I be hiding" - and look there!
Try to understand, Norbert, finding gold isn't the hard part.
It's not?
No, the hard part is keeping it.
You don't know it, but you're about to witness a legend being made.
You look the same to me.
Maybe I am different. But I beat those men. It's not the gun... it's me.
In the American West, a gun touched by evil passed from hand to hand, changing the lives of all who possessed it. As its legend grew, it became known as... "the dead man's gun".
Like I said before, Cole, ain't no good can come from a dead man's gun. Get rid of it! Throw it away!
For him, not me!
I cannot in good conscience allow myself to be party to this deception.
How much?
I beg your pardon?
How much is your conscience going to cost me?
Aren't you supposed to be married?
Forbidden fruit always tastes the sweetest.
What about you wife?
What about her? She stuck with me when I was nobody. She has faith in me. She's kind... loyal.
If that's all you want, Harry, why not get a dog?
None of us knows the future, Willy. A man has to grasp his opportunities as they come.
Harry McDonacle is a small-time character with a big-time ambition... an ego in search of a career.
My dear, in life it doesn't pay to examine anything too closely. You'll find that even the most perfect rose has a blemish.
This ain't much of a town. It's only got one saloon here.
It don't matter. That's all we got money for.
Harry, what are you doing? He's just a boy!
Well, if he's this stupid, he's not going to grow up to be a man, now is he?
You're going to hell, mister!
If I am, it won't be alone!
